main event: A witness observed a bright silvery object traveling at a high speed in Los Gatos, California on August 30, 1952.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be about 30 to 40 feet in diameter., The object was observed maneuvering and changing directions rapidly., The estimated speed of the object was around 200-220 miles per hour., The witness has a background in aviation and experience with military aircraft., The report was filled out as part of Project Blue Book to document UFO sightings.
